column4: Hey I also updated to 11.10 but somehow my dash often is below my active applications
anyone know why my active applications are often atop of dash?  it's quite annoying to always minimize everything to be able to see the dash
if it makes you feel better/worse, I have the same problem and was googling to no avail.
cwillu  well I have the tendency to experiment a lot with my ubuntu  so that if there is a new release almost everything is f*cked up  and I have to do a fresh install :D
